title: Cant click PLAY button and we restored an old version
body:
Hello, today when i started my League of legends it apears a message that says '' 
We've restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to update it to the latest version.'' then when i press ok and log in When i try to play a game is said '' It was not possible to create a lobby right now.Close the client and try to restart it.''

replies.body: It sounds like your client is having problems getting a clean download of the latest patch. We can try to force a repatch to make sure all the files are intact with our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Give that tool a run with the force repatch option turned on and let me know how that helps!
